Package dao

Class OrderDao

java.lang.Object
dao.OrderDao
public class OrderDao
extends java.lang.Object
Handles the connectivity in regard with the objects of type Order: selecting, deleting ,finding, updating from the database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    OrderDao()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static boolean delete​(Order order)
    Deletes a given order from the database.
    static Order findById​(int orderId)
    Uses the given id to find an order in the database.
    static boolean generateBill​(Order order)
    Generates a .txt file containing the products purchased, their quantity and respective price and the price of the entire order.
    static int insert​(Order order)
    Inserts a given order to a database.
    static int insertProductOrder​(Order order, Product product, int quantity)
    Adds a product to an order.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • OrderDao

      public OrderDao()

  • Method Details

    • findById

      public static Order findById​(int orderId)
      Uses the given id to find an order in the database. Creates a new order with the found data and returns it.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The unique id of the order in the database;
      Returns:
      The found order.

    • insert

      public static int insert​(Order order)
      Inserts a given order to a database. First the data from the object is extracted, then an update query is executed.
      Parameters:
      order - The order which will be added.
      Returns:
      If the insert was successful, the new id of the order is returned. In case of failure, -1 is returned.

    • delete

      public static boolean delete​(Order order)
      Deletes a given order from the database. The id is extracted, then an update query is executed.
      Parameters:
      order - The order to be deleted.
      Returns:
      True or false depending whether the order was found or not.

    • insertProductOrder

      public static int insertProductOrder​(Order order, Product product, int quantity)
      Adds a product to an order. The operation is done by inserting an element in the junction table products_order in the database.
      Parameters:
      order - The order to which the product belongs.
      product - The purchased product.
      quantity - Its given quantity.
      Returns:
      The new id of the product_order row, -1 in case of failure.

    • generateBill

      public static boolean generateBill​(Order order)
      Generates a .txt file containing the products purchased, their quantity and respective price and the price of the entire order.
      Parameters:
      order - The order whose bill is generated.
      Returns:
      True or not depending on whether the bill was generated successfully or not.
